attributes.action: Make formal examinations computer based to reduce deforestation
attributes.additional_details: Because of the current state of affairs with climate change I think examinations cause a huge waste of paper which is reducing our planet of a lot of trees this would be a way to help this
attributes.background: Make it so students have to do their formal tests on computers instead of on paper

rejection.details: Decisions about the conduct of exams are a matter for exam boards and individual educational institutions, and are not a matter for the UK Government or Parliament.
